column1: Smoque BBQ////I would have to submit this place as one of the most white washed places I've been to in a while. It felt really suburban.  On top of that
column2: we had to listen to two guys next to us use the phrase "amazing" at least half a dozen times.  Really
column3: amazing?  They must not eat out much.  If you live nearby
column5: and take the food to go.  Otherwise
column6: eat at a place closer to home. Or grill some meat yourself.
